name: Notebook
description: Represents a OneNote notebook. Notebooks contain section groups and sections.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the notebook.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Gets the name of the notebook.

methods.name: getSections
methods.description: Gets the sections in the notebook.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: true to retrieve all child sections, or false to retrieve direct child sections only. Default is false.

methods.name: getSectionGroups
methods.description: Gets the section groups in the notebook.

methods.name: addSection
methods.description: Adds a new section to the end of the notebook.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new section.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
